thread.title: Ground News - Palestinian shot dead by Israeli forces after stabbing attack
thread.title_full: Ground News - Palestinian shot dead by Israeli forces after stabbing attack

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Palestinian shot dead by Israeli forces after stabbing attack
text:
Summary by Ground News A Palestinian was shot dead by Israeli security forces after stabbing two security personnel at a checkpoint near Jerusalem on Thursday. A statement from the Israeli police said the attacker approached the checkpoint and "after stopping his vehicle near the inspection station, he exited and stabbed two Security personnel on duty," causing mild injuries.
